decks.notes: This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive gameplay by utilizing fast creatures like Amped Raptor and Guide of Souls, backed up by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge. The deck also includes disruption elements such as Static Prison and Blood Moon to slow down the opponent's strategy. The key strategy is to establish a strong board presence quickly and deal damage efficiently to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Jegantha, the Wellspring provides additional value as a companion, adding versatility to the deck's gameplay.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul and Ulamog. It also includes ways to control the board with cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command. Through the Breach is used as another way to cheat in big creatures. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large threats while disrupting their game plan with control elements. The lands and artifacts in the deck help to accelerate mana production and provide additional utility.

This deck revolves around controlling the game using powerful cards like The One Ring, Teferi, Time Raveler, and Leyline Binding to disrupt your opponent's strategy. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells like Supreme Verdict and Solitude, as well as versatile creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Endurance. With a variety of lands to ensure you have the right colors of mana when needed, the deck aims to outlast your opponent and establish dominance over the game with its strong control elements and resilient threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creature and direct damage spells. By utilizing cards like Goblin Bombardment and Flare of Malice, along with cards like Chthonian Nightmare and Gravecrawler, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Unearth and Fatal Push for removal and disruption. The mana base is designed to support the aggressive playstyle, with a mix of lands that can produce the necessary colors while also providing additional utility.

The main concept of this Modern 1 vs 1 Ruby Storm deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly using cards like Ruby Medallion and Desperate Ritual, as well as cards like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible to draw through the deck and find combo pieces. With the help of cards like Wish and Pyretic Ritual, the deck aims to play Past in Flames multiple times to cast a large number of spells in a single turn and ultimately win the game through a powerful combo sequence.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Amulet of Vigor to generate fast mana and ramp into Primeval Titan, allowing you to search for powerful lands like The One Ring and Urza's Saga. By abusing land synergies and using cards like Explore and Arboreal Grazer, you can quickly assemble powerful combinations for explosive plays. The deck also includes utility lands like Mirrorpool and Hanweir Battlements to give you flexibility in different situations. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to create a powerful combo engine that can quickly overwhelm your opponent with big threats and synergistic land plays.

This deck focuses on using spells and abilities to quickly reanimate powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn from the graveyard, bypassing their high mana cost. It also includes cards like Goryo's Vengeance and Fatal Push to help facilitate this strategy. The deck also includes disruption and card filtering spells to control the game and find key pieces for the combo. Overall, the goal is to quickly get Emrakul onto the battlefield to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing various control elements such as discard spells and removal to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes cards that allow the player to gain life and generate value from sacrificing creatures. The win condition is through powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and using spells like Soul Spike to finish off the opponent. The deck also has a slight graveyard recursion theme with cards like Necrodominance. The overall goal is to control the game and outvalue the opponent until victory is achieved.

This Dredge combo deck focuses on utilizing graveyard synergy and self-mill effects to quickly populate the battlefield with powerful creatures like Vengevine and Prized Amalgam. Otherworldly Gaze and Gravecrawler help to facilitate the combo, while Flare of Denial provides protection. The deck also includes cards like Creeping Chill and Narcomoeba for additional value. The strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive graveyard-based game plan, utilizing various dredge and recursive elements to maintain pressure and close out the game quickly.

This deck revolves around quickly ramping up mana to cast Primeval Titan and The One Ring combo, allowing for powerful creature and land plays. Utilizing Amulet of Vigor and Simic Growth Chamber, the deck aims to generate immense value through land triggers and tutoring effects. With the ability to search for key pieces like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Urza's Saga, this deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with large creatures and land destruction. The combination of synergy between creatures, lands, and spells makes this deck a formidable force in Modern 1 vs 1 matchups.

This deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and powerful creatures. The key concept is to establish a dominant board presence using cards like The One Ring and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse while keeping the opponent off balance with disruptive spells like Spell Pierce and Force of Negation. By controlling the tempo of the game and managing resources effectively, this deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through sheer card advantage and strategic play.

The deck focuses on quickly generating mana with cards like Pyretic Ritual and Ruby Medallion to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames to create an overwhelming storm of spells. Using cards like Wish and Valakut Awakening to find key pieces and refill the hand, the deck aims to chain together spells and combo off to win the game in explosive fashion. By efficiently generating mana and utilizing card draw and manipulation, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly with a flurry of spells.
